question: Who among the following was the authors wrote 'Manucharitam' ?
explanation: The famous Telugu poet Allasani Peddana (1510-1575 AD) was one of the Ashtadiggajas (the group of eight Telugu poets) in the royal court of Krishnadevaraya, a ruler of the Vijayanagara Empire. He composed Swaarochisha Manu Sambhavam (or Manucharitam). The book is a development of an episode in the Markandeya Purana relating to the birth of Svarochishamanu, who is one of the fourteen Manus.
